alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Livingston and southwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springfield, or near Hammond, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Albany, Springfield, Whitehall and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 31 and 44. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 22 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
